title: German Potato Pancakes Recipe
description: This German potato pancake recipe pan-fries shredded potatoes and onion until golden brown and crispy potato for a savory alternative to regular pancakes.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Side Dish Potato Pancakes German Potato Pancakes 4.7 (879) 661 Reviews 98 Photos These German potato pancakes are a nice change from regular pancakes. They make a great dinner meal when served with Bratwurst sausage. I spread mine with cranberry sauce and top with maple syrup. Submitted by SWIZZLESTICKS Updated on November 18, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 98 98 98 98 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 25 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 2 large eggs 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour ¼ teaspoon baking powder ½ teaspoon salt ¼ teaspoon pepper 6 medium potatoes, peeled and shredded ½ cup finely chopped onion ¼ cup vegetable oil Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Beat eggs, flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl; stir in potatoes and onion. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of potato mixture into hot oil in batches. Press to flatten. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook until browned and crisp, about 3 minutes on each side. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Repeat with remaining potato mixture. Enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 1,445 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 283 Calories 11g Fat 41g Carbs 7g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 283 % Daily Value * Total Fat 11g 14% Saturated Fat 2g 10% Cholesterol 62mg 21% Sodium 246mg 11% Total Carbohydrate 41g 15% Dietary Fiber 5g 18% Total Sugars 2g Protein 7g 14% Vitamin C 43mg 48% Calcium 47mg 4% Iron 2mg 12% Potassium 943mg 20% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of German Potato Pancakes 01 of 98 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 98 Photo by  Julia Priestley 03/01/2022 Well see how they taste 03 of 98 Photo by  Jaime 12/31/2020 04 of 98 Photo by  domin 12/11/2020 05 of 98 Photo by  Sandi Wojo 12/01/2020 This was an easy recipe and super delicious. 06 of 98 Photo by  Jeff Bachman 10/28/2020 07 of 98 Photo by  Billy Leggins 08/29/2020 08 of 98 Photo by  Dani Hess 08/22/2020 So good I’ve made them twice this week! I used the frozen shredded potatoes that I defrosted before hand. Afterwards I added sour cream and scallions. They were delicious, super crunchy outside but that soft mashed potato texture on the inside. They taste just like my favorite german restaurant’s potato pancakes in NY 09 of 98 Photo by  Mama Mia 07/03/2020 10 of 98 Photo by  Susan Manser 05/31/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Potato Pancakes 165 Ratings Cajun Potato Latkes 16 Ratings Bramboracky (Czech Savory Potato Pancakes) 28 Ratings Kay Dee's Recipe for Potato Latkes 29 Ratings Foolproof Potato Latkes 35 Ratings Easy Leftover Potato Pancakes 186 Ratings Dad's Potato Pancakes 100 Ratings Potato Pancakes 307 Ratings Roesti 18 Ratings Anne's Potato Pancakes 31 Ratings Corned Beef Potato Pancakes 27 Ratings Chef John's Classic Potato Pancakes 57 Ratings Irish Boxty 115 Ratings Bacon Potato Pancakes 26 Ratings Boxty 14 Ratings Cheesy Potato Pancakes 97 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: SWIZZLESTICKS

Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of potato mixture into hot oil in batches. Press to flatten. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Cook until browned and crisp, about 3 minutes on each side. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Repeat with remaining potato mixture. Enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
